text: The UEFA Euro 2016 Final was a football match that took place on 10 July 2016 at the Stade de France in Saint-Denis, Île-de-France, France. The game determined the winner of the UEFA Euro 2016.UEFA Euro 2016 Final. UEFA.com. The match was played with Portugal and France, and Portugal won the match with a goal from Éder at the 109th minute. == Match == ===Details=== {| style="font-size:90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"
